data.meaning: vt. 推想、假设、猜想vi.料想 conj.假使...结果会怎样

app_sentences.en: I suppose we will have a test next Monday.
app_sentences.cn: 我想我们下星期一会有一次测验。

app_sentences.en: I suppose we can go to the park this afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 我想我们今天下午可以去公园。

app_sentences.en: She has a small birthmark on her left arm.
app_sentences.cn: 她的左臂上有一个小小的胎记。

data.meaning: adj. 明亮的、辉煌的、欢快的

app_sentences.en: The classroom is bright and clean with many windows.
app_sentences.cn: 教室有很多窗户，明亮又干净。

app_sentences.en: The stars are very bright in the dark and clear night sky.
app_sentences.cn: 在黑暗晴朗的夜空中，星星非常明亮。

app_sentences.en: The sun is very bright today, so wear your hat.
app_sentences.cn: 今天太阳很亮，所以戴上你的帽子。

app_sentences.en: The sun is very bright today, so I wear my sunglasses.
app_sentences.cn: 今天的阳光很明亮，所以我戴上了太阳镜。

app_sentences.en: My favourite fruit is strawberry because it is sweet.
app_sentences.cn: 我最喜欢的水果是草莓，因为它很甜。

app_sentences.en: The bus is always very crowded in the morning.
app_sentences.cn: 早上公共汽车总是非常拥挤。

app_sentences.en: The heavy rain caused a disaster in the small town.
app_sentences.cn: 大雨在这个小镇造成了一场灾难。

app_sentences.en: She studies very hard, therefore she gets good grades.
app_sentences.cn: 她学习非常努力，因此取得了好成绩。

data.meaning: n. 盖子、封面、藉口vt.覆盖

app_sentences.en: Please cover your books with paper to protect them.
app_sentences.cn: 请用纸把你的书包起来以保护它们。

app_sentences.en: I didn't go swimming; I played basketball instead.
app_sentences.cn: 我没有去游泳，而是打了篮球。

app_sentences.en: He did not go to the cinema, instead he stayed at home.
app_sentences.cn: 他没有去电影院，而是待在家里。

app_sentences.en: Let's take a walk instead of watching TV all afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 我们别整个下午看电视，去散步吧。

app_sentences.en: We played basketball instead of football yesterday.
app_sentences.cn: 我们昨天打篮球而不是踢足球。

app_sentences.en: Although it was raining, we still went for a walk.
app_sentences.cn: 虽然下着雨，但我们还是去散步了。

app_sentences.en: I need to go to the bathroom before we leave the house.
app_sentences.cn: 在我们离开家之前我需要去一下洗手间。

app_sentences.en: She quickly finished her homework and went out to play.
app_sentences.cn: 她很快完成了作业然后出去玩。

app_sentences.en: I am truly happy that you can come to my birthday party.
app_sentences.cn: 你能来我的生日聚会，我真的很开心。

data.meaning: n. 油漆、颜料、涂料v.油漆

app_sentences.en: We will paint the fence white during the art class tomorrow.
app_sentences.cn: 明天美术课上我们要把栅栏漆成白色。

app_sentences.en: We will paint the wall blue to match the new furniture.
app_sentences.cn: 我们要把墙刷成蓝色来配新家具。

app_sentences.en: He has not finished his project for school yet.
app_sentences.cn: 他还没有完成他的学校项目。

app_sentences.en: He hasn't finished his project yet, but he will soon.
app_sentences.cn: 他还没有完成他的项目，但他很快会完成。

app_sentences.en: It might rain later, but we will go for a picnic anyway.
app_sentences.cn: 稍后可能会下雨，但无论如何我们都要去野餐。

app_sentences.en: I have already read this interesting book twice.
app_sentences.cn: 我已经把这本书有趣的书读了两遍。

app_sentences.en: Can you tell the difference between these two pictures?
app_sentences.cn: 你能说出这两张图片的区别吗？

app_sentences.en: I hate getting up early on cold winter mornings.
app_sentences.cn: 我讨厌在寒冷的冬日早晨早起。

app_sentences.en: After years of hard work, she became a successful writer.
app_sentences.cn: 经过多年努力，她成为了一名成功的作家。

app_sentences.en: We did a scientific experiment in the school lab yesterday.
app_sentences.cn: 我们昨天在学校实验室做了一个科学实验。

data.meaning: adj. 英明的、明智的、慎虑的

app_sentences.en: My grandfather always gives me wise advice.
app_sentences.cn: 我的祖父总是给我明智的建议。

app_sentences.en: My grandfather always gives me wise advice about life.
app_sentences.cn: 我的祖父总是给我关于人生的明智建议。

data.meaning: n. 完成式adj.完美的、全然的、理想的

app_sentences.en: The weather is perfect for flying a kite in the park today.
app_sentences.cn: 今天的天气非常适合在公园放风筝。

app_sentences.en: We sit in the front row during the school assembly.
app_sentences.cn: 在学校集会时我们坐在前排。

app_sentences.en: We sat in the front row to watch the school play.
app_sentences.cn: 我们坐在前排观看学校话剧。

data.meaning: n. 高度、海拔、高地(常用复数)

app_sentences.en: His height makes him a good basketball player.
app_sentences.cn: 他的身高使他成为一名优秀的篮球运动员。

app_sentences.en: His height makes him a good player on the basketball team.
app_sentences.cn: 他的身高让他成为篮球队的一名好队员。

data.meaning: n. 文学(作品)、文艺、著作

app_sentences.en: We study English literature to learn about famous stories.
app_sentences.cn: 我们学习英国文学是为了了解著名的故事。

data.meaning: n. (事物的)特性、性质、特征(的总和)

app_sentences.en: The main character in the book is a brave young girl.
app_sentences.cn: 书中的主要角色是一个勇敢的小女孩。

app_sentences.en: The main character in this film is a brave young girl.
app_sentences.cn: 这部电影的主角是一个勇敢的小女孩。

app_sentences.en: The wizard in the story used magic to help the poor people.
app_sentences.cn: 故事中的巫师使用魔法帮助穷人。

app_sentences.en: We use our brain to think, learn and solve problems.
app_sentences.cn: 我们用大脑来思考、学习和解决问题。

app_sentences.en: My grandmother taught me the value of being honest.
app_sentences.cn: 我的祖母教会了我诚实的价值。

app_sentences.en: My mother taught me the value of honesty and hard work.
app_sentences.cn: 我母亲教会我诚实和努力工作的价值。

app_sentences.en: This shop sells clothes of good quality at fair prices.
app_sentences.cn: 这家店以公平的价格出售质量好的衣服。

data.meaning: adj. 不可能的、不会发生的、难以忍受的

app_sentences.en: It is impossible to finish all this homework in one hour.
app_sentences.cn: 在一小时内完成所有这些家庭作业是不可能的。

app_sentences.en: Nothing is impossible if you put your heart into it.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你全心投入，没有什么是不可能的。

data.meaning: n. 无、不关紧要之事、[数]零adv.毫不

app_sentences.en: There is nothing in the box; it is completely empty.
app_sentences.cn: 盒子里什么都没有；它完全是空的。

data.meaning: adj. 大不列颠的、英国的、英国人的

app_sentences.en: She is reading a book about British history for her project.
app_sentences.cn: 她正在为她的项目读一本关于英国历史的书。

app_sentences.en: She wants to be a famous actress when she grows up.
app_sentences.cn: 她长大后想成为一名著名的女演员。

app_sentences.en: The young actress won an award for her first film.
app_sentences.cn: 这位年轻的女演员因她的第一部电影而获奖。

app_sentences.en: My grandmother gave me a beautiful silver necklace.
app_sentences.cn: 我的祖母给了我一条漂亮的银项链。

data.phonetic: [英 ðə ˌsɪlvə ˈskriːn 美 ðə ˌsɪlvər ˈskriːn]
data.meaning: n. 电影业；银屏、多个、银海沉浮

app_sentences.en: Many famous actors appear on the silver screen.
app_sentences.cn: 许多著名演员出现在银幕上。

data.meaning: n. 怀疑、疑惑、疑问v.怀疑

app_sentences.en: I have no doubt that you will pass the English exam.
app_sentences.cn: 我毫不怀疑你会通过英语考试。

app_sentences.en: Many children fear the dark and like to sleep with a light on.
app_sentences.cn: 许多孩子害怕黑暗，喜欢开着灯睡觉。

app_sentences.en: Some children have a fear of speaking in front of the class.
app_sentences.cn: 有些孩子害怕在全班面前讲话。

data.meaning: vi. (～ in) 成功v.继...之后、继任、继承

app_sentences.en: If you work hard, you will succeed in the final exam.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你努力学习，你会在期末考试中取得成功。

app_sentences.en: If you work hard, you will succeed in achieving your dreams.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你努力，你就会成功实现梦想。

app_sentences.en: She got an excellent score on her final science test.
app_sentences.cn: 她在最终的科学考试中取得了优异的分数。

app_sentences.en: He finished the race in second place, which is very good.
app_sentences.cn: 他以第二名的成绩完成了比赛，这非常好。

app_sentences.en: I felt satisfied after I finished cleaning my messy room.
app_sentences.cn: 在打扫完我凌乱的房间后，我感到很满意。

app_sentences.en: Swimming alone in the deep sea is a very risky thing to do.
app_sentences.cn: 独自在深海里游泳是一件非常冒险的事情。

app_sentences.en: The temperature dropped to zero degrees last night.
app_sentences.cn: 昨晚气温降到了零度。

app_sentences.en: Many athletes train for years to compete in the Olympics.
app_sentences.cn: 许多运动员为参加奥运会训练多年。

app_sentences.en: The young athlete runs every morning to stay fit and strong.
app_sentences.cn: 这位年轻的运动员每天早晨跑步以保持健康强壮。

app_sentences.en: We use glue to stick the pictures onto the paper.
app_sentences.cn: 我们用胶水把图片粘到纸上。

app_sentences.en: He uses a stick to draw pictures in the sand on the beach.
app_sentences.cn: 他用一根棍子在沙滩上的沙子里画画。

app_sentences.en: You should stick to your plan if you want to finish on time.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你想按时完成，就应该坚持你的计划。

data.meaning: n. 具有超人能力的人、超人

app_sentences.en: In the comic book, Superman can fly and has super strength.
app_sentences.cn: 在漫画书里，超人能飞并且有超强力量。

data.meaning: v. 呼喊、呼叫n.呼喊、呼叫

app_sentences.en: Please do not shout in the library; we must keep quiet.
app_sentences.cn: 请不要在图书馆大喊；我们必须保持安静。

app_sentences.en: We will meet at the school gate at three o'clock this afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 我们今天下午三点在学校门口见面。

app_sentences.en: Please wait for me at the school gate at four o'clock.
app_sentences.cn: 请四点钟在校门口等我。

data.meaning: v. 建造、建筑n.构造、体格

app_sentences.en: The workers will build a new playground for our school next month.
app_sentences.cn: 工人们下个月将为我们学校建造一个新操场。

app_sentences.en: They decided to build a new library for the children.
app_sentences.cn: 他们决定为孩子们建一座新图书馆。

data.meaning: adv. 以后、后来、以前 prep.自从

app_sentences.en: I have known my best friend since we were in primary school.
app_sentences.cn: 我从小学就认识我最好的朋友了。

app_sentences.en: She has lived in this city since she was five years old.
app_sentences.cn: 她从五岁起就一直住在这个城市。

app_sentences.en: He doesn't like coffee, nor does he like tea in the morning.
app_sentences.cn: 他不喜欢咖啡，早上也不喜欢茶。

app_sentences.en: There is a small hole in my sock, so I need to buy new ones.
app_sentences.cn: 我的袜子上有一个小洞，所以我需要买新袜子。

data.meaning: adj. 高兴的、乐意的、感到高兴的

app_sentences.en: I am glad that you could come to my birthday party yesterday.
app_sentences.cn: 我很高兴你昨天能来我的生日聚会。

app_sentences.en: Remember to knock on the door before you enter the teacher's office.
app_sentences.cn: 进老师办公室前记得先敲门。

data.meaning: 击倒、拆卸、拍卖出；拍板成交

app_sentences.en: Be careful not to knock down the vase on the table.
app_sentences.cn: 小心别碰倒桌子上的花瓶。

app_sentences.en: My little sister is afraid of the dark, so she sleeps with a light on.
app_sentences.cn: 我的小妹妹怕黑，所以她开着灯睡觉。

app_sentences.en: I left a message on your phone about our meeting time.
app_sentences.cn: 我在你手机上留言了，是关于我们开会时间的。

app_sentences.en: I left a message on your desk to remind you about the meeting.
app_sentences.cn: 我在你桌上留了条信息提醒你开会。

data.meaning: n. 两倍、[计] 双精度型adj.两倍的、双重的vt.使加倍vi.加倍

app_sentences.en: This math problem is double the difficulty of the last one.
app_sentences.cn: 这道数学题的难度是上一道的两倍。

app_sentences.en: We need a double room for my parents when they visit us.
app_sentences.cn: 我父母来看我们时我们需要一个双人间。

app_sentences.en: Good friends always show understanding when you have problems.
app_sentences.cn: 好朋友在你遇到问题时总是表示理解。

app_sentences.en: Please remember to return the library books by next Friday.
app_sentences.cn: 请记得在下周五前归还图书馆的书。

data.meaning: adj. 活泼的、活跃的、栩栩如生的

app_sentences.en: The music at the party was lively and made everyone dance.
app_sentences.cn: 聚会上的音乐很活泼，让每个人都跳起舞来。

data.meaning: pron. 他们的(所有物)、属于他们的(东西)

app_sentences.en: Our classroom is big, but theirs is even bigger and brighter.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的教室很大，但他们的教室更大更明亮。

data.meaning: n. 等级、级别vt.评分、评级v.分等级

app_sentences.en: I am in Grade Seven and my sister is in Grade Nine.
app_sentences.cn: 我在七年级，我姐姐在九年级。

app_sentences.en: She got a good grade on her history test because she studied hard.
app_sentences.cn: 她历史考试取得了好成绩，因为她学习很努力。

app_sentences.en: I read an interesting article about space in the magazine.
app_sentences.cn: 我在杂志上读到一篇关于太空的有趣文章。

app_sentences.en: I read an interesting article about space in the school magazine.
app_sentences.cn: 我在校刊上读了一篇关于太空的有趣文章。

app_sentences.en: The old photo of my family is priceless to me.
app_sentences.cn: 我的这张旧家庭照片对我来说是无价之宝。

data.meaning: n. 出价、提议、意图vt.提供

app_sentences.en: The shop will offer a discount on all clothes this weekend.
app_sentences.cn: 这家店本周末所有衣服都会打折。

data.meaning: n. 计划、设计图、平面图vt.计划

app_sentences.en: We plan to visit our grandparents during the summer holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 我们计划暑假期间去看望祖父母。

app_sentences.en: We need a good plan before we start the group project.
app_sentences.cn: 在我们开始小组项目前需要一个好计划。

app_sentences.en: It is quite cold outside today, so you should wear a coat.
app_sentences.cn: 今天外面相当冷，所以你应该穿件外套。

data.meaning: adj. 感到有压力的、紧张的

app_sentences.en: She felt stressed before the big exam, so she took a deep breath.
app_sentences.cn: 大考前她感到压力很大，所以她做了深呼吸。

app_sentences.en: I recently read a very interesting science fiction book.
app_sentences.cn: 我最近读了一本非常有趣的科幻书。

app_sentences.en: We recently watched a very funny film at the cinema.
app_sentences.cn: 我们最近在电影院看了一部非常有趣的电影。

app_sentences.en: Many students learn English online through interesting videos.
app_sentences.cn: 许多学生通过有趣的视频在线学习英语。

app_sentences.en: My parents allow me to watch TV for one hour after dinner.
app_sentences.cn: 我父母允许我晚饭后看一小时电视。

app_sentences.en: I bought a ticket to see the new science exhibition.
app_sentences.cn: 我买了一张票去看新的科学展览。

data.meaning: adj. 真实的、真正的、忠实的

app_sentences.en: It is true that regular exercise is good for your health.
app_sentences.cn: 经常锻炼对健康有益，这是真的。

app_sentences.en: We should respect our teachers and listen carefully in class.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该尊重老师，上课认真听讲。

data.meaning: n. 狭窄部分、海峡、隘路adj.狭窄的

app_sentences.en: The path to the small village is very narrow and winding.
app_sentences.cn: 通往小村庄的小路非常狭窄且曲折。

app_sentences.en: Cyclists should use the bike lane for safety on the road.
app_sentences.cn: 骑车者应使用自行车道以保证道路安全。

app_sentences.en: Perhaps we can go to the library together after school.
app_sentences.cn: 也许放学后我们可以一起去图书馆。

app_sentences.en: Perhaps we can go swimming if the weather is sunny tomorrow.
app_sentences.cn: 如果明天天气晴朗，或许我们可以去游泳。

app_sentences.en: It's not good to argue with friends over small things.
app_sentences.cn: 为小事和朋友争吵是不好的。

app_sentences.en: Please divide the cake into eight equal pieces.
app_sentences.cn: 请把蛋糕分成八等份。

app_sentences.en: We need to divide the cake into eight equal pieces for everyone.
app_sentences.cn: 我们需要把蛋糕分成八等份给每个人。

app_sentences.en: The river acts as a dividing line between the two towns.
app_sentences.cn: 这条河是这两个镇之间的分界线。

app_sentences.en: I cannot reach the top shelf because I am not tall enough.
app_sentences.cn: 我够不到顶层的架子，因为我不够高。

app_sentences.en: I cannot reach the book on the top shelf because I am too short.
app_sentences.cn: 我够不到书架顶层的书，因为我太矮了。

app_sentences.en: After long discussion, they finally reached an agreement.
app_sentences.cn: 经过长时间的讨论，他们终于达成了一致。

app_sentences.en: After discussion, we finally came to an agreement on the plan.
app_sentences.cn: 讨论之后，我们终于就计划达成了一致。

data.meaning: n. 亲戚、关系词、相关物

app_sentences.en: Many relatives came to my grandmother's birthday party.
app_sentences.cn: 许多亲戚来参加了我祖母的生日聚会。

app_sentences.en: My uncle is a close relative who often visits us at the weekend.
app_sentences.cn: 我的叔叔是一位近亲，经常在周末来看我们。

app_sentences.en: The local government built a new hospital for the community.
app_sentences.cn: 当地政府为社区新建了一家医院。

data.meaning: n. 诗、象诗一样、美丽的东西

app_sentences.en: She wrote a beautiful poem about spring for the school magazine.
app_sentences.cn: 她为校刊写了一首关于春天的美丽诗歌。

app_sentences.en: It's warm inside the house, but it's cold outside today.
app_sentences.cn: 今天房子里很暖和，但外面很冷。

app_sentences.en: It is warm inside the room even if it's cold outside.
app_sentences.cn: 即使外面很冷，房间里还是很温暖。

app_sentences.en: Our neighbour is a kind old lady who often helps us.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的邻居是一位善良的老太太，经常帮助我们。

app_sentences.en: Our neighbour is very kind and often helps us with our garden.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的邻居很友善，经常帮我们打理花园。

app_sentences.en: In the school play, he will act the role of a brave king.
app_sentences.cn: 在学校话剧里，他将扮演一位勇敢的国王。

app_sentences.en: I hope I can pass all my subjects this term.
app_sentences.cn: 我希望这学期我能通过所有科目。

app_sentences.en: Please pass the salt to me during dinner.
app_sentences.cn: 请吃饭时把盐递给我。

app_sentences.en: I hope to pass all my exams at the end of this term.
app_sentences.cn: 我希望在这学期末通过我所有的考试。

data.meaning: conj. 无论何时、随时n.只要

app_sentences.en: You can call me whenever you need help with your homework.
app_sentences.cn: 无论何时你需要作业帮助，你都可以打电话给我。

data.meaning: adj. 美丽的、女性的、(肤色)白皙的

app_sentences.en: Our teacher is always fair when she gives us marks.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的老师在给我们打分时总是很公平。

app_sentences.en: It's not fair that she got more candy than I did.
app_sentences.cn: 她得到的糖果比我多，这不公平。

app_sentences.en: The teacher is always fair when she gives marks to students.
app_sentences.cn: 老师在给学生打分时总是很公平。

app_sentences.en: The children play football on the empty block near their homes.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们在他们家附近的空地上踢足球。

data.meaning: adj. 人造的、假的、非原产地的

app_sentences.en: The Christmas tree in our living room is artificial.
app_sentences.cn: 我们客厅里的圣诞树是人造的。

app_sentences.en: You must keep your books in good condition.
app_sentences.cn: 你必须保持你的书完好无损。

app_sentences.en: The old book is in very good condition for its age.
app_sentences.cn: 这本旧书就其年代而言保存状况非常好。

data.meaning: n. 成本、价钱、代价vt.价值为

app_sentences.en: This new bicycle costs too much money for me to buy now.
app_sentences.cn: 这辆新自行车太贵了，我现在买不起。

app_sentences.en: Could you lend me your pen? I need to write something down.
app_sentences.cn: 你能把你的笔借给我吗？我需要写点东西。

app_sentences.en: Can you lend me your blue pen for the writing test?
app_sentences.cn: 你能把你的蓝笔借给我写作考试用吗？

app_sentences.en: We need a new printer because the old one is broken.
app_sentences.cn: 我们需要一台新打印机，因为旧的坏了。

app_sentences.en: Thomas Edison worked hard to invent the light bulb.
app_sentences.cn: 托马斯·爱迪生努力发明了电灯泡。

app_sentences.en: Thomas Edison worked hard to invent the electric light bulb.
app_sentences.cn: 托马斯·爱迪生努力发明了电灯泡。

app_sentences.en: The doctor asked me to weigh myself every week.
app_sentences.cn: 医生要求我每周称体重。

app_sentences.en: Can you weigh this bag of apples for me, please?
app_sentences.cn: 请问你能帮我称一下这袋苹果吗？

app_sentences.en: This bag of rice weighs one kilogram, not very heavy.
app_sentences.cn: 这袋大米重一千克，不算很重。

app_sentences.en: My dad can fix my broken bicycle chain.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸能修理我坏掉的自行车链条。

app_sentences.en: My father can fix my bicycle when the wheel is broken.
app_sentences.cn: 我父亲能在车轮坏了时修理我的自行车。

app_sentences.en: The telephone is a great invention that changed the world.
app_sentences.cn: 电话是一项改变了世界的伟大发明。

app_sentences.en: The telephone is an important invention that changed the world.
app_sentences.cn: 电话是一项改变了世界的重要发明。

app_sentences.en: You can download the song from the internet to your phone.
app_sentences.cn: 你可以从网上下载这首歌到你的手机上。

data.meaning: vt. 申请、应用vi.申请、适用

app_sentences.en: You need to apply for the job by sending an email first.
app_sentences.cn: 你需要先发电子邮件申请这份工作。

data.meaning: adj. 瞎的、盲目的vt.使失明、缺乏眼光或判断力

app_sentences.en: The blind man walks across the street with the help of his dog.
app_sentences.cn: 那位盲人在他的狗的帮助下过马路。

app_sentences.en: The kind man has a blind dog that helps him cross the street.
app_sentences.cn: 这位善良的男子有一只导盲犬帮他过马路。

data.meaning: n. 机器、机械、机动车辆

app_sentences.en: This washing machine makes it easy to clean our clothes.
app_sentences.cn: 这台洗衣机让洗衣服变得容易。

app_sentences.en: This machine can help people clean the floor easily now.
app_sentences.cn: 现在这台机器能帮助人们轻松地打扫地板。

data.meaning: vt. 警告、注意、通知vi.发出警告

app_sentences.en: The sign warns people not to swim in the deep part of the lake.
app_sentences.cn: 标志警告人们不要在湖的深水区游泳。

app_sentences.en: The strange object in the sky turned out to be a kite.
app_sentences.cn: 天空中的奇怪物体原来是一只风筝。

app_sentences.en: Wearing a helmet when riding a bike makes good sense.
app_sentences.cn: 骑自行车时戴头盔是很有道理的。

app_sentences.en: Dogs have a very good sense of smell and hearing.
app_sentences.cn: 狗有非常好的嗅觉和听觉。

app_sentences.en: Congratulations on winning the first prize in the contest!
app_sentences.cn: 祝贺你在比赛中获得一等奖！

app_sentences.en: Congratulations on winning first prize in the speech competition!
app_sentences.cn: 恭喜你在演讲比赛中获得一等奖！

app_sentences.en: I saw an advertisement for a new sports shop on television.
app_sentences.cn: 我在电视上看到了一个新运动商店的广告。

data.meaning: adj. 每天的、日常的、平常的

app_sentences.en: Wearing a school uniform is part of our everyday life.
app_sentences.cn: 穿校服是我们日常生活的一部分。

app_sentences.en: Wearing jeans and a T-shirt is my everyday style for school.
app_sentences.cn: 穿牛仔裤和T恤是我上学的日常风格。

app_sentences.en: I have trouble understanding this difficult maths problem.
app_sentences.cn: 我理解这道数学难题有困难。

app_sentences.en: She is very creative and often draws beautiful pictures.
app_sentences.cn: 她非常有创造力，经常画漂亮的画。

app_sentences.en: The children wrote an imaginative story about a magic land.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们写了一个关于魔法之地的富有想象力的故事。

app_sentences.en: An inventor needs to have many creative ideas and work hard.
app_sentences.cn: 发明家需要有创造性的想法并努力工作。

data.meaning: adv. 广泛地、普遍地、广博地

app_sentences.en: English is widely used in many countries around the world.
app_sentences.cn: 英语在世界许多国家被广泛使用。

app_sentences.en: His curiosity about space led him to read many books about it.
app_sentences.cn: 他对太空的好奇心驱使他读了许多相关的书。

app_sentences.en: She has a natural talent for playing the piano very well.
app_sentences.cn: 她有弹好钢琴的天赋。

app_sentences.en: Remember to turn off the lights to save electricity.
app_sentences.cn: 记得关灯节约用电。

app_sentences.en: We use electricity to power lights, computers and televisions.
app_sentences.cn: 我们用电来为灯、电脑和电视供电。

data.meaning: n. 闪电 ("闪电") 英国第一种超音速喷气式战斗机、英60年代的主力机种。

app_sentences.en: We saw bright lightning during the heavy storm last night.
app_sentences.cn: 昨晚暴风雨期间我们看到了明亮的闪电。

app_sentences.en: The tall building has a lightning rod to keep it safe.
app_sentences.cn: 这座高楼有一个避雷针来保证安全。

data.meaning: n. 先驱、倡导者、先遣兵

app_sentences.en: He is a pioneer in the field of computer science.
app_sentences.cn: 他是计算机科学领域的先驱。

app_sentences.en: He was a pioneer in exploring the deep forests of South America.
app_sentences.cn: 他是探索南美洲深林的先驱者。

app_sentences.en: Space exploration helps us learn more about the universe.
app_sentences.cn: 太空探索帮助我们更多地了解宇宙。

data.meaning: n. 测试、试验、检验v.测试

app_sentences.en: We will have a vocabulary test in English class next Friday.
app_sentences.cn: 我们下周五英语课将有一次词汇测验。

app_sentences.en: We have a short English test every Friday morning.
app_sentences.cn: 我们每周五上午有一个简短的英语测验。

app_sentences.en: Despite the rain, the football match continued as planned.
app_sentences.cn: 尽管下雨，足球比赛仍按计划进行。

app_sentences.en: Failure is not the end; it is a chance to learn and try again.
app_sentences.cn: 失败不是终点；它是一个学习和再尝试的机会。

app_sentences.en: In the future, I hope to become a helpful doctor.
app_sentences.cn: 未来，我希望成为一名有帮助的医生。

app_sentences.en: We should work hard now to have a bright and happy future.
app_sentences.cn: 为了有一个光明幸福的未来，我们现在应该努力。

data.meaning: Windows资源管理器、n.探险家、探测者

app_sentences.en: The famous explorer travelled to many unknown places.
app_sentences.cn: 这位著名的探险家去过许多未知的地方。

data.meaning: vt. 冒...的危险n.冒险、风险

app_sentences.en: Climbing that high mountain alone is a big risk to take.
app_sentences.cn: 独自攀登那座高山是一个很大的风险。

data.meaning: n. 驾车、驱动器、快车道

app_sentences.en: My father will drive us to the beach for a picnic tomorrow.
app_sentences.cn: 我父亲明天会开车送我们去海滩野餐。

app_sentences.en: My father can drive a car but my mother can't.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸会开车但他妈妈不会。

data.meaning: n. 地震、[喻]在震荡、在变动

app_sentences.en: The earthquake caused a lot of damage to the buildings.
app_sentences.cn: 地震对建筑物造成了很大破坏。

app_sentences.en: The earthquake caused some damage to buildings in the city.
app_sentences.cn: 地震对城市里的一些建筑造成了破坏。

app_sentences.en: The big earthquake destroyed many houses in the small town.
app_sentences.cn: 那场大地震摧毁了小镇上的许多房子。

app_sentences.en: I looked through the keyhole to see who was outside the door.
app_sentences.cn: 我透过钥匙孔看门外是谁。

data.meaning: adj. 数字的、数位的、手指的n.数字

app_sentences.en: Most people use digital cameras on their phones now.
app_sentences.cn: 现在大多数人用手机上的数码相机。

app_sentences.en: We live in the twenty-first century, which is full of technology.
app_sentences.cn: 我们生活在充满科技的二十一世纪。

app_sentences.en: I hope our friendship will last forever and never change.
app_sentences.cn: 我希望我们的友谊能永远持续，永不改变。

app_sentences.en: He uses his smartphone to read news and chat with friends.
app_sentences.cn: 他用智能手机看新闻和与朋友聊天。

app_sentences.en: I keep my money and bus card in a small red wallet.
app_sentences.cn: 我把钱和公交卡放在一个小红钱包里。

app_sentences.en: You can make a payment for the book online or in the shop.
app_sentences.cn: 你可以在网上或在店里为这本书付款。

app_sentences.en: I don't have enough cash to buy this new dictionary now.
app_sentences.cn: 我现在没有足够的现金买这本新字典。

data.meaning: 应用、应用程序、相联并行处理器

app_sentences.en: There is a useful app for learning new English words.
app_sentences.cn: 有一个学习新英语单词的有用应用程序。

app_sentences.en: My mother put the cake in the oven to bake for thirty minutes.
app_sentences.cn: 我妈妈把蛋糕放进烤箱烤三十分钟。

app_sentences.en: Everyone in our class went to the museum except Tom.
app_sentences.cn: 除了汤姆，我们班每个人都去了博物馆。

app_sentences.en: It is very convenient to have a supermarket near our home.
app_sentences.cn: 我们家附近有个超市非常方便。

app_sentences.en: The rapid development of technology changes our lives.
app_sentences.cn: 科技的快速发展改变了我们的生活。

app_sentences.en: The rapid development of technology changes our lives quickly.
app_sentences.cn: 科技的快速发展迅速改变了我们的生活。

data.meaning: adj. 可移动的、易变的、机动的n.运动物体

app_sentences.en: A mobile phone allows us to call people from almost anywhere.
app_sentences.cn: 手机让我们几乎能从任何地方给别人打电话。

app_sentences.en: You can sit anywhere you like in the classroom today.
app_sentences.cn: 今天你可以坐在教室里任何你喜欢的地方。

app_sentences.en: We need a great deal of water for the plants in the garden.
app_sentences.cn: 我们需要大量的水来浇灌花园里的植物。

app_sentences.en: We can send messages via email or through social media apps.
app_sentences.cn: 我们可以通过电子邮件或社交媒体应用程序发送信息。

data.meaning: n. 前进、进步、发展vi.前进

app_sentences.en: My English teacher is happy with my progress this term.
app_sentences.cn: 我的英语老师对我这学期的进步感到高兴。

app_sentences.en: He made good progress in English after practising every day.
app_sentences.cn: 经过每天练习，他在英语上取得了很大进步。

data.meaning: adj. 未连线的、未联机的、脱机的

app_sentences.en: You can read the book offline after you download it to your tablet.
app_sentences.cn: 你把书下载到平板电脑后可以离线阅读。

app_sentences.en: Nowadays, many students use computers to do their homework.
app_sentences.cn: 如今，许多学生用电脑做作业。

app_sentences.en: You can simply click this button to start the game.
app_sentences.cn: 你只需点击这个按钮就可以开始游戏。

app_sentences.en: You can simply click the button to start the game on the computer.
app_sentences.cn: 你可以简单地点击按钮在电脑上开始游戏。

app_sentences.en: We should save water by turning off the tap when not using it.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该节约用水，不用水时关掉水龙头。

app_sentences.en: I save some money every week to buy a new bicycle next year.
app_sentences.cn: 我每周存一些钱，以便明年买一辆新自行车。

data.meaning: n. 优势、有利条件、利益

app_sentences.en: One advantage of cycling is that it is good for your health.
app_sentences.cn: 骑自行车的一个好处是对健康有益。

app_sentences.en: The medicine had a good effect and made her feel better quickly.
app_sentences.cn: 这药效果很好，让她很快感觉好多了。

app_sentences.en: Can I borrow your glue to fix my broken notebook?
app_sentences.cn: 我能借你的胶水来修补我破损的笔记本吗？

app_sentences.en: We use glue to stick the pieces of paper together for our project.
app_sentences.cn: 我们用胶水把纸片粘在一起做我们的项目。

app_sentences.en: He was glued to his phone and didn't hear his mother calling him.
app_sentences.cn: 他全神贯注地盯着手机，没听见妈妈叫他。

data.meaning: adj. 陌生的、生疏的、前所未知的

app_sentences.en: We heard a strange noise coming from the old house next door.
app_sentences.cn: 我们听到隔壁旧房子里传来奇怪的声音。

app_sentences.en: Please throw the rubbish into the bin to keep our classroom clean.
app_sentences.cn: 请把垃圾扔进垃圾桶以保持教室清洁。

app_sentences.en: Can you guess how many sweets are in this big glass jar?
app_sentences.cn: 你能猜出这个大玻璃罐里有多少颗糖吗？

app_sentences.en: Is there anyone in the classroom who can answer this question?
app_sentences.cn: 教室里有人能回答这个问题吗？

app_sentences.en: I share my bedroom with my younger sister, and we have two beds.
app_sentences.cn: 我和我妹妹共用一间卧室，我们有两张床。

app_sentences.en: My bedroom is small but very comfortable and clean.
app_sentences.cn: 我的卧室虽然小，但非常舒适和干净。

app_sentences.en: I spent one hour doing my maths homework yesterday evening.
app_sentences.cn: 我昨天晚上花了一个小时做数学作业。

app_sentences.en: I usually finish my homework before I watch TV on Friday.
app_sentences.cn: 周五看电视前我通常先完成作业。

app_sentences.en: I always finish my homework before I watch television in the evening.
app_sentences.cn: 我总是先完成作业，然后在晚上看电视。

data.meaning: adj. 相对的、对面的、对立的

app_sentences.en: The post office is opposite the bank on the main street.
app_sentences.cn: 邮局在主街上银行的对面。

app_sentences.en: She bought a packet of biscuits to share with her friends.
app_sentences.cn: 她买了一包饼干和朋友们分享。

app_sentences.en: We had a lovely picnic in the park with sandwiches and fruit.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在公园里吃了一顿愉快的野餐，有三明治和水果。

app_sentences.en: Please take the smelly rubbish out of the kitchen right now.
app_sentences.cn: 请现在就把厨房里发臭的垃圾拿出去。

data.meaning: n. 干酪、<俚>头等的人或事物

app_sentences.en: My favourite sandwich has cheese, tomato and lettuce in it.
app_sentences.cn: 我最喜欢的三明治里有奶酪、番茄和生菜。

app_sentences.en: The noise from the construction site next door is very loud.
app_sentences.cn: 隔壁建筑工地的噪音非常大。

app_sentences.en: We should reduce the use of plastic bags to help the environment.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该减少使用塑料袋以帮助环境。

app_sentences.en: He can kick the football very far.
app_sentences.cn: 他能把足球踢得很远。

app_sentences.en: He can kick the football very far because he practises a lot.
app_sentences.cn: 他能把足球踢得很远，因为他练习很多。

app_sentences.en: Please take a seat and wait for your name to be called.
app_sentences.cn: 请坐下，等待叫到你的名字。

app_sentences.en: Please find your seat and sit down quietly for the lesson.
app_sentences.cn: 请找到你的座位，安静地坐下准备上课。

app_sentences.en: All passengers must wear seat belts on the bus.
app_sentences.cn: 所有乘客在公交车上都必须系安全带。

app_sentences.en: Every passenger on the bus must wear a seat belt for safety.
app_sentences.cn: 为了安全，公交车上的每位乘客都必须系安全带。

app_sentences.en: Is there anything else I can help you with for the party?
app_sentences.cn: 关于派对，还有什么我可以帮你的吗？

app_sentences.en: You can ask me anything about the homework if you don't understand.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你不明白，可以问我任何关于作业的问题。

app_sentences.en: Only a fool would go swimming in such cold weather.
app_sentences.cn: 只有傻瓜才会在这么冷的天气去游泳。

app_sentences.en: There is a 'No Smoking' sign on the wall of the classroom.
app_sentences.cn: 教室墙上有一个'禁止吸烟'的标志。

app_sentences.en: The sign says 'Stop', so all cars must wait here.
app_sentences.cn: 标志上写着'停'，所以所有汽车必须在这里等待。

app_sentences.en: I have a sore throat, so I drank some warm tea with honey.
app_sentences.cn: 我喉咙痛，所以我喝了一些加蜂蜜的热茶。

app_sentences.en: He cleared his throat before starting his speech to the class.
app_sentences.cn: 他在开始向全班演讲之前清了清嗓子。

app_sentences.en: It is our responsibility to keep our school clean and tidy.
app_sentences.cn: 保持学校干净整洁是我们的责任。

data.meaning: n. 原因、导致某事发生的人或事、动机

app_sentences.en: Eating too much sugar can cause health problems like toothache.
app_sentences.cn: 吃太多糖会导致如牙痛等健康问题。

app_sentences.en: He wore a black leather belt with his new blue jeans.
app_sentences.cn: 他穿新蓝色牛仔裤时配了一条黑色皮带。

app_sentences.en: Always fasten your seat belt when you are in a moving car.
app_sentences.cn: 乘坐行驶的汽车时，一定要系好安全带。

app_sentences.en: We will meet at the train station at eight o'clock tomorrow morning.
app_sentences.cn: 我们明天早上八点在火车站见面。

app_sentences.en: My grandmother grows small red flowers in a clay flowerpot.
app_sentences.cn: 我祖母在陶土花盆里种小红花。

app_sentences.en: Please pick up the piece of paper you dropped on the floor.
app_sentences.cn: 请把你掉在地上的那张纸捡起来。

app_sentences.en: I will pick up my little brother from his school at four o'clock.
app_sentences.cn: 我四点会去学校接我弟弟。

app_sentences.en: My brother's room is always a mess with toys everywhere.
app_sentences.cn: 我弟弟的房间总是一团糟，玩具到处都是。

app_sentences.en: Please tidy up the mess in your room before your friends come.
app_sentences.cn: 在你的朋友们来之前，请把你房间的杂乱收拾一下。

app_sentences.en: Honesty is very important; we should always tell the truth.
app_sentences.cn: 诚实非常重要；我们应该永远说实话。

app_sentences.en: We should try to spread kindness and help others.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该努力传播善意并帮助他人。

app_sentences.en: We spread the map on the table to plan our trip to the city.
app_sentences.cn: 我们把地图铺在桌子上计划我们的城市之旅。

data.meaning: v. 起诉；n. 法律、法则、定律

app_sentences.en: It is the law that you must not drive a car without a licence.
app_sentences.cn: 法律禁止你无证驾驶。

app_sentences.en: The lawyer helped the man understand his rights in the court.
app_sentences.cn: 律师帮助这位男子了解他在法庭上的权利。

app_sentences.en: I have an urgent message for you from your mother, please call her.
app_sentences.cn: 我有一个你母亲发来的紧急口信，请给她打电话。

app_sentences.en: As a good citizen, you should follow the rules of the society.
app_sentences.cn: 作为一个好公民，你应该遵守社会规则。

data.meaning: v. 发出滴答声n.滴答声

app_sentences.en: Just click on the icon to open the program on your computer.
app_sentences.cn: 只需点击图标即可在电脑上打开程序。

data.meaning: n. 基本原理、要素、基本规律；adj. 基本的、碱性的；(计算机)BASIC语言

app_sentences.en: We learn basic maths like addition and subtraction in primary school.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在小学学习加法和减法等基础数学。

data.meaning: adj. 私人的、个人的、亲自的

app_sentences.en: My diary is personal, so I don't let anyone else read it.
app_sentences.cn: 我的日记是私人的，所以我不让其他人看。

data.meaning: adj. 私人的、私有的、私营的

app_sentences.en: This diary is private, so please do not read it.
app_sentences.cn: 这本日记是私人的，所以请不要阅读。

app_sentences.en: This is a private beach, so only hotel guests can use it.
app_sentences.cn: 这是一个私人海滩，所以只有酒店客人可以使用。

app_sentences.en: You should avoid making the same mistake next time.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该避免下次再犯同样的错误。

app_sentences.en: To avoid being late, we left home thirty minutes early.
app_sentences.cn: 为了避免迟到，我们提前三十分钟离开了家。

app_sentences.en: Can you write down your home address on this paper, please?
app_sentences.cn: 请在这张纸上写下你的家庭住址好吗？

app_sentences.en: Please write down your name and address on this form.
app_sentences.cn: 请在这张表格上写下你的姓名和地址。

app_sentences.en: Please write your name and address clearly on the application form.
app_sentences.cn: 请在申请表上清楚地写下你的姓名和地址。

app_sentences.en: You need a passport to travel to another country.
app_sentences.cn: 你需要护照才能去另一个国家旅行。

app_sentences.en: You need a passport to travel to a foreign country.
app_sentences.cn: 你需要护照才能去外国旅行。

data.meaning: n. 界限、限度、限制vt.限制

app_sentences.en: There is a speed limit on this road to keep drivers safe.
app_sentences.cn: 这条路上有限速以确保驾驶员安全。

app_sentences.en: He was careless and lost his new pencil case on the bus.
app_sentences.cn: 他很粗心，把新铅笔盒丢在公交车上了。

data.meaning: adj. 知道的、明白的、意识到的

app_sentences.en: You should be aware of the dangers of using fire without an adult.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该意识到在没有成人的情况下使用火的危险。

data.meaning: n. 欺骗、骗子v.欺骗、骗取

app_sentences.en: It is wrong to cheat in an exam by looking at another's paper.
app_sentences.cn: 考试时看别人的试卷作弊是错误的。

app_sentences.en: Good friends should always trust each other.
app_sentences.cn: 好朋友应该总是相互信任。

app_sentences.en: Good friends trust each other and share their secrets.
app_sentences.cn: 好朋友互相信任并分享秘密。

data.meaning: n. 敌人、仇敌、[集合名词]敌军

app_sentences.en: In the story, the brave knight fought against the enemy.
app_sentences.cn: 在故事中，勇敢的骑士与敌人战斗。

app_sentences.en: In the story, the brave knight fights against the enemy to save the king.
app_sentences.cn: 在故事里，勇敢的骑士与敌人作战以拯救国王。

data.meaning: vi. 举动、举止、运转v.行为表现

app_sentences.en: Children should behave well when they visit their grandparents.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们去看望祖父母时应该表现良好。

app_sentences.en: Cyberbullying online can hurt people's feelings very badly.
app_sentences.cn: 网络上的网络欺凌会严重伤害人们的感情。

data.meaning: adj. 失去的、丧失的、错过的

app_sentences.en: I got lost in the big shopping mall and had to ask for help.
app_sentences.cn: 我在大购物中心迷路了，不得不求助。

app_sentences.en: Don't throw rubbish on the ground. Put it in the bin.
app_sentences.cn: 不要把垃圾扔在地上，放进垃圾桶里。

app_sentences.en: There are many yellow leaves on the ground in early autumn.
app_sentences.cn: 初秋地上有很多黄叶。

app_sentences.en: The children sat on the ground to have their picnic under the tree.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们坐在地上，在树下野餐。

app_sentences.en: There are many yellow leaves on the ground in autumn.
app_sentences.cn: 秋天地上有很多黄叶。

app_sentences.en: The little girl was scared of the loud thunder during the storm.
app_sentences.cn: 小女孩被暴风雨中的响雷吓到了。

app_sentences.en: Please shut the window because it's cold outside.
app_sentences.cn: 请关上窗户，因为外面很冷。

app_sentences.en: Please shut the window because it is starting to rain outside.
app_sentences.cn: 请关上窗户，因为外面开始下雨了。

data.meaning: adj. 骇人听闻的、非常讨厌的、不正当的

app_sentences.en: The news about the sudden earthquake was shocking to everyone.
app_sentences.cn: 关于突然地震的消息让每个人都感到震惊。

data.meaning: n. 四轮大马车、长途汽车、教练v.训练

app_sentences.en: The football coach teaches us how to play better as a team.
app_sentences.cn: 足球教练教我们如何作为一个团队打得更好。

data.meaning: adj. 直的、诚实的、正直的

app_sentences.en: Go straight along this road, and you will see the post office.
app_sentences.cn: 沿着这条路直走，你就会看到邮局。

app_sentences.en: Go straight down this road and you will see the library on your left.
app_sentences.cn: 沿着这条路直走，你会看到左边的图书馆。

app_sentences.en: Children like to play with sand on the beach.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们喜欢在海滩上玩沙子。

app_sentences.en: We built a big castle with wet sand on the beach yesterday.
app_sentences.cn: 我们昨天用海滩上的湿沙建了一个大城堡。

data.meaning: n. 洪水、水灾、(因雨)涨潮

app_sentences.en: The heavy rain caused a flood in some streets of the town.
app_sentences.cn: 大雨在镇上的一些街道造成了一场洪水。

app_sentences.en: She wore a thick coat to keep warm in the cold winter wind.
app_sentences.cn: 她穿了一件厚外套在寒冷的冬风中保暖。

app_sentences.en: We could see smoke coming from the chimney of the house.
app_sentences.cn: 我们能看见烟从房子的烟囱里冒出来。

app_sentences.en: I take a quick shower every morning before I go to school.
app_sentences.cn: 我每天早晨上学前快速冲个澡。

data.meaning: adj. 历史(上)的、有关历史的

app_sentences.en: We visited a historical building that is over two hundred years old.
app_sentences.cn: 我们参观了一座有两百多年历史的历史建筑。

data.meaning: n. 专家、行家、[军](特等)射手adj.老练的

app_sentences.en: The science expert gave us a talk about protecting the environment.
app_sentences.cn: 科学专家给我们做了一个关于保护环境的讲座。

app_sentences.en: We drew a timeline to show important events in world history.
app_sentences.cn: 我们画了一条时间线来展示世界历史上的重要事件。

data.meaning: n. 反应、反作用、反动(力)

app_sentences.en: Her first reaction to the surprise party was a big, happy smile.
app_sentences.cn: 她对惊喜派对的第一个反应是一个大大的、快乐的笑容。

app_sentences.en: My father works for an airline and sometimes travels to other countries.
app_sentences.cn: 我父亲在一家航空公司工作，有时会去其他国家。

app_sentences.en: On a weekday, I go to school from Monday to Friday.
app_sentences.cn: 在工作日，我从周一到周五去上学。

app_sentences.en: The new railway will make travel between the two cities faster.
app_sentences.cn: 新铁路将使两个城市之间的旅行更快。

app_sentences.en: The sudden rainstorm forced us to cancel our picnic in the park.
app_sentences.cn: 突如其来的暴风雨迫使我们取消了公园野餐。

data.meaning: n. 服务、服务性工作、服役

app_sentences.en: The service at this restaurant is very good and the food is delicious.
app_sentences.cn: 这家餐厅的服务很好，食物也很美味。

data.meaning: n. 搜寻、查究v.搜索、探求

app_sentences.en: I used the internet to search for information about my science project.
app_sentences.cn: 我用互联网搜索关于我的科学项目的信息。

app_sentences.en: We love our motherland and are proud of its long history.
app_sentences.cn: 我们热爱我们的祖国，并为其悠久的历史感到自豪。

data.meaning: adj. 很糟的、极坏的、可怕的

app_sentences.en: I had a terrible headache yesterday, so I stayed in bed all day.
app_sentences.cn: 我昨天头痛得厉害，所以一整天都躺在床上。

app_sentences.en: Wild animals are in danger because their natural homes are lost.
app_sentences.cn: 野生动物由于天然家园的丧失正处于危险之中。

app_sentences.en: There is danger in playing with fire because it can burn you.
app_sentences.cn: 玩火有危险，因为它会烧伤你。

app_sentences.en: A tsunami can cause huge waves and damage to coastal towns.
app_sentences.cn: 海啸会引起巨浪并对沿海城镇造成破坏。

app_sentences.en: The weather warning told people to stay indoors during the storm.
app_sentences.cn: 天气预警告诉人们在暴风雨期间待在室内。

app_sentences.en: My mother uses an iron to make our clothes smooth and tidy.
app_sentences.cn: 我妈妈用熨斗把我们的衣服熨得平整。

app_sentences.en: She is interested in fashion and likes to design her own clothes.
app_sentences.cn: 她对时尚感兴趣，喜欢设计自己的衣服。

data.meaning: adj. 苗条的、纤细的、不足取的

app_sentences.en: He keeps slim by exercising every day and eating healthy food.
app_sentences.cn: 他通过每天锻炼和吃健康食品来保持苗条。

app_sentences.en: If you cut your finger, it might bleed a little bit.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你割伤手指，可能会流一点血。

data.meaning: adj. 不舒服的、不安的、不合意的

app_sentences.en: These new shoes are uncomfortable, so I need to wear older ones.
app_sentences.cn: 这双新鞋不舒服，所以我需要穿旧一点的。

app_sentences.en: I usually wear jeans and a T-shirt to school.
app_sentences.cn: 我通常穿牛仔裤和T恤去上学。

app_sentences.en: Most students wear jeans and T-shirts to school on casual days.
app_sentences.cn: 在便装日，大多数学生穿牛仔裤和T恤上学。

app_sentences.en: My teacher gave me an encouraging smile before the big test.
app_sentences.cn: 我的老师在大考前给了我一个鼓励的微笑。

data.meaning: pron. 她自己、她本人亲自

app_sentences.en: She made the birthday cake all by herself.
app_sentences.cn: 她完全是自己做的生日蛋糕。

app_sentences.en: She cooked dinner all by herself for the first time yesterday.
app_sentences.cn: 她昨天第一次完全靠自己做了晚餐。

app_sentences.en: My dream is to go to a good university after high school.
app_sentences.cn: 我的梦想是高中毕业后去一所好大学。

app_sentences.en: My elder brother studies computer science at a big university.
app_sentences.cn: 我哥哥在一所大型大学学习计算机科学。

app_sentences.en: It is a great honour to receive this award for best student.
app_sentences.cn: 获得最佳学生奖是一项巨大的荣誉。

data.meaning: n. 创伤、伤口vt.伤、伤寒v.击伤

app_sentences.en: The doctor cleaned and bandaged the soldier's wound.
app_sentences.cn: 医生清洗并包扎了士兵的伤口。

app_sentences.en: The nurse cleaned the small wound on his knee and put a bandage on it.
app_sentences.cn: 护士清理了他膝盖上的小伤口并贴上了绷带。

app_sentences.en: The heroine in the book was brave and saved her family from danger.
app_sentences.cn: 书中的女主人公很勇敢，将她的家人从危险中救出。
